content: 1 coffee cozy carrier worsted weight cotton yarn g crochet hook chain 30 slip_stitch into 1st chain to form a ring chain 1 be careful not to twist chain row 1 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in next 29 st chain 1 30 single_crochet row 2 single_crochet in joining st *skip 2 5dc in next space* repeat from * to * 8 times single_crochet in ist single_crochet chain 1 9 shells row 3 single_crochet in joining st slip_stitch to 3rd double_crochet *chain 4 single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet of next shell * repeat from * to * 8 times chain 4 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 9 chain 4 sections row 4 single_crochet in joining st *skip 2 6dc in next space single_crochet in single_crochet from previous row * repeat from * to * 8 times 9 shells row 5 single_crochet in joining st single_crochet in same st slip_stitch to 3rd double_crochet *chain 4 single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet of next shell * repeat from * to * 8 times chain 4 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 9 chain 4 sections row 6 single_crochet in joining st *skip 2 6dc in next space single_crochet in single_crochet from previous row * repeat from * to * 8 times 9 shells row 7 single_crochet in joining st single_crochet in same st slip_stitch to 3rd double_crochet *chain 4 single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet of next shell * repeat from * to * 8 times chain 4 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 9 chain 4 sections row 8 single_crochet in joining st *skip 2 6dc in next space single_crochet in single_crochet from previous row * repeat from * to * 8 times chain 1 turn 9 shells row 9 single_crochet in joining st single_crochet in same st slip_stitch to 3rd double_crochet *chain 4 single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet of next shell * repeat from * to * 8 times chain 4 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 9 chain 4 sections row 10 single_crochet in joining st chain 2 single_crochet in same st * hd 2dc 2 tc 2 double_crochet hd in next space single_crochet in single_crochet from previous row * repeat from * to * 8 times chain 1 9 shells row 11 & 12 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *chain 3 single_crochet in between sts of previous row * repeat from * to * 8 times fasten_off after row 12 ties make 2 1 chain 100 weave between row 9 and 10 knot ends f chain together 2 note when weaving 2nd chain start where 1st chain ended… this part of the weave will be larger than all other weaves… then weave in and out normal please let me know of any mistakes you find in this pattern http //joy-paka-tavish-sadie-indy blogspot com/ ©2008 paula gaumer tooke all good
